comment: The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
amr:
# ::snt The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "N"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / ethnic-group
                        :mod (a2 / all))
                  :op2 (g / group
                        :mod (s2 / society)
                        :mod (a3 / all)))
            :ARG1 (t / tolerate-01)))

comment: Hi There, Please refrain from using racist comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thank you
amr:
# ::snt Hi There, Please refrain from using racist comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thank you
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "There")))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG3 (r2 / racist))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (h2 / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 (t / they))
            :op2 (r3 / reflect-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t2 / they
                        :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                              :ARG2-of (v / view-02
                                    :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                          :mod (m2 / most)
                                          :location (h3 / here))))))
            :snt4 (t4 / thank-01
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you))))

comment: Please avoid racist language and sentiments. They are unacceptable.
